name: iPad® mini 2
highlights:
7.9-inch Retina display (diagonal)
A7 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture chip
5MP iSight camera with 1080p video
1.2 FaceTime HD camera
802.11n Wi-Fi with MIMO
LTE cellular data connectivity
categoryIcons:
Access the 4G LTE network* to send and receive pictures, download music, watch videos and browse the Internet at speeds up to 10 times faster than 3G. *4G LTE network available only in select cities. See coverage map for details.

Data Plan Required
talkTime: Up to 9 hours of surfing the web using cellular data network
standbyTime: Up to 10 hours of surfing the web on Wi-Fi, watching video, or listening to music
processor: A7 chip and M7 motion coprocessor
deviceFinancingTargeter: If you have financed your device, the financed installment amount is not displayed, and will increase the Total Due Monthly amount on your actual bill.
